name: HKLiveWorkoutBuilder
desc: A builder object that constructs a workout incrementally based on live data from an active workout session.

items.name: var dataSource: HKLiveWorkoutDataSource?
items.desc: A data source that provides live data from a workout session automatically.

items.name: var workoutSession: HKWorkoutSession?
items.desc: The workout session created by the data source and associated with this builder.

items.name: protocol HKLiveWorkoutBuilderDelegate
items.desc: A protocol for monitoring live workout builders.

items.name: var shouldCollectWorkoutEvents: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the workout builder automatically adds events generated by the workout session.

items.name: var elapsedTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The elapsed time for the workout based on the builder's current contents, including pauses.
